Ratings.comment: Kathy Waller is ver unprofessional and uses the classroom as her little prison. she exhibited discriminatory behavior and did not demonstrate appropriate regard for her students. Additionally, there have been instances where she opted for complicating matters rather than fostering a conducive and educational atmosphere.

Wow, she is so nice and quirky and keeps you awake, but it's just too hard. If you are a non certain student, you will struggle to keep up as cert students spend hours a day in lab learning the stuff more, getting ahead. 18/25 failed a midterm this quarter, and she just talked about how she wouldn't lower her standards... Maybe the test was too hard dr Waller? Come on! BTW NO CURVE!!! Nice lady though.
Possibly the best teacher ever!  Easy to ace the tests if you put in a lot of time.  She teaches very difficult classes extremely well.  1-2-3-WOOSH
she is a good professor and class participation is a must with her ( be ready to clap your hands and repeat stuff). You won't fall asleep in class (she will make sure of it)
